title: Flag of Ukraine
cardDescription: The state flag of Ukraine is a banner of two equally sized horizontal bands of blue and yellow color.
description: The state flag of Ukraine is a banner of two equally sized horizontal bands of blue and yellow color. As a national flag, the blue and yellow bi-color was officially used since the 1848 Spring of Nations when it was hoisted over the Lviv Rathaus. It was officially adopted as a state flag for the first time in 1918.

content.content: This pattern is worked horizontally starting from top left.

content: With A, ch 30, sc in 2nd ch and each ch across, turn

content.content: For help with the pattern, please see the General Instructions from the main page:
